announcements.title: HCS 2019 SWAT Tournament Finals!
announcements.subtitle: Our top players for this year's 'SWAT gametype'
announcements.content:
Our top 4 SWAT players this year, averagin' at a 25.0 k/d ratio per GAME will face off this independence day.
The tournament will be publicly streamed and featured on the Official Halo Waypoint site!
Tune in to watch these legendary players battle it out in one epic 2v2!

- 343 Industries
